Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

marginaleffects 0.2.0 Unreleased

Breaking change:

  • data argument becomes newdata in all functions.

marginaleffects:

  • Support lme4:glmer.nb
  • Support mgcv::gam
  • Support ordinal::clm
  • Support mgcv

marginalmeans:

  • New variables_grid argument

predictions:

  • Support mgcv

plot_cap

  • New type argument

Misc:

  • New validity checks and tests

marginaleffects 0.1.0 2021-09-29

First release. Bravo!

Thanks to Marco Avina Mendoza, Resul Umit, and all those who offered comments and suggestions.
